targets.expr: sum(rate(django_http_requests_total_by_view_transport_method_total{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(django_http_requests_total_by_view_transport_method_total{namespace=~"$namespace", view="images:vector_tiles"}[$__rate_interval]))
topk(10, sum by (view) (rate(django_http_requests_total_by_view_transport_method_total{namespace=~"$namespace", view!="images:vector_tiles"}[$__rate_interval])))

# P50 - median response time
histogram_quantile(0.50, 
  sum(rate(django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", view!="images:vector_tiles", view!="images:osm_elements_tiles", view!="images:semantic_search", view!="images:text_search", view!="images:reverse_image_search"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
) * 1000

# P95 - captures most user experience  
histogram_quantile(0.95, 
  sum(rate(django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", view!="images:vector_tiles", view!="images:osm_elements_tiles", view!="images:semantic_search", view!="images:text_search", view!="images:reverse_image_search"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
) * 1000

# P99 - tail latency for SLO tracking
histogram_quantile(0.99, 
  sum(rate(django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", view!="images:vector_tiles", view!="images:osm_elements_tiles", view!="images:semantic_search", view!="images:text_search", view!="images:reverse_image_search"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
) * 1000

panels.description: Does not include assets like CSS and JavaScript bundles.

panels.title: Homepage Latency

targets.expr:
# P50 - median response time
histogram_quantile(0.50, 
  sum(rate(django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", view="images:vector_tiles"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
) * 1000

sum by (status) (rate(django_http_responses_total_by_status_total{namespace=~"$namespace", status!="200"}[$__rate_interval]))

100 * (
  (sum(rate(django_http_responses_total_by_status_total{namespace=~"$namespace", status=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0))
  /
  sum(rate(django_http_responses_total_by_status_total{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
)

# 4xx by endpoint (client errors - may indicate API misuse)
sum by (view) (rate(django_http_responses_total_by_status_view_method_total{namespace=~"$namespace", status=~"4.."}[$__rate_interval]))

# 5xx by endpoint (server errors - actionable)
sum by (view) (rate(django_http_responses_total_by_status_view_method_total{namespace=~"$namespace", status=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(django_db_execute_total{namespace=~"$namespace", vendor="postgresql"}[$__rate_interval])) by (alias)

sum(rate(django_db_errors_total{namespace=~"$namespace", vendor="postgresql"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)
or vector(0)
sum(rate(django_db_errors_total{namespace=~"$namespace", vendor="postgresql"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)

# P50 - median response time
histogram_quantile(0.50, 
  sum(rate(django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", view="images:semantic_search"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
) * 1000

# P95 - captures most user experience  
histogram_quantile(0.95, 
  sum(rate(django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", view="images:semantic_search"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
) * 1000

# P99 - tail latency for SLO tracking

  sum(rate(django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{namespace=~"$namespace", view="images:semantic_search"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)
) * 1000
